robotsTxt:
User-agent: *

# Only allow URLs generated with RealURL (deprecated - deleted soon)
#Disallow: /*?id=*
#Disallow: /*&id=*

# L=0 is the default language
Disallow: /*?L=0*
Disallow: /*&L=0*

# typeNum = 2002 is the weather details page
Disallow: /*?type=2002*
Disallow: /*&type=2002*

# tx_typoscriptrendering is the ski reports details page
Disallow: /*?tx_typoscriptrendering*
Disallow: /*&tx_typoscriptrendering*

# Should always be protected (.htaccess)
Disallow: /*/Private/*
Disallow: /*/Configuration/*

# Do not index typo3temp (except some resources)
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.css$
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.css.*.gzip$
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.js$
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.js.*.gzip$
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.jpg$
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.gif$
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.png$
#Allow: /typo3temp/*.svg$
#Disallow: /typo3temp/*

# Do not index typo3 extensions (except some resources)
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.css$
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.css.*.gzip$
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.js$
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.js.*.gzip$
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.jpg$
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.gif$
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.png$
#Allow: /typo3conf/*.svg$
#Disallow: /typo3conf/*

# Do not index typo core files (except some resources)
Allow: /typo3/*.css$
Allow: /typo3/*.css.*.gzip$
Allow: /typo3/*.js$
Allow: /typo3/*.js.*.gzip$
Allow: /typo3/*.jpg$
Allow: /typo3/*.gif$
Allow: /typo3/*.png$
Allow: /typo3/*.svg$
Disallow: /typo3/*

Disallow: *.sql
Disallow: *.sql.gz

Disallow: *.popup-360
Disallow: *.popup-bookmarked

# Do not index matomo
Disallow: /matomo/*
